original: gang mi shes pa des ni ji ltar bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gang mi shes pa des ni ji ltar bstan par bya ste /

analyzed: 'phags pa mood gal gyi bu chen po'i slob ma gnyis ji ltar phyin ci log tu bstan pa'i dpe 'dir brjod do //

translated: He is not compassionate, because he does not teach them, even though he is enthusiastic, etc., as long as they are confused, thinking that they are the best.

original: mi bstan pas ni bstan pa la zhugs par byas pa'i 'og tu phyed tsam mi bstan nas lhag ma gzhan dag tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: mi bstan pas ni bstan pa la zhugs par byas pa'i 'og tu phyed tsam mi bstan nas lhag ma gzhan dag tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: He does not teach, because after he has caused them to enter the teaching, he does not teach them half of it, but causes them to enter the other half.

analyzed: dus ring ba ni dus mang por bdag 'di nyid du gnas pas gzhan bstan par bya'o zhes smra zhing de bzhin nyid mi ston pa ste /
translated: The long duration is the long duration of the self in this world, and the teaching of another is the teaching of a self in another world.

original: de bzhin nyid ston pa'i bar chad ni drug po 'di dag go //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ston pa'i bar chad ni drug po 'di dag go //

original: bcom ldan 'das la ni 'di dag mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la ni 'di dag mi mnga' ste /

original: des na gang des gsungs pa ma lus shing phyin ci ma log par zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩde nyid kyang 'jig @55a * //
analyzed: des na gang des gsungs pa ma lus shing phyin ci ma log par zhes bya ba yin no // de nyid kyang 'jig @55a * //

analyzed: bdag gis ched du brjod pa'i rnam pa 'di gsungs she na /

analyzed: smras pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i nyes pa de dag rgyal ba la mi mnga' bar ston to /

original: nyon mongs pa btsam pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa btsam pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: He is the Lord because he has destroyed the afflictions.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa //

analyzed: 'dod chags de bzhin na zhe sdang dang // gti mug bcom pa'i 'dren pa ste / sdig pa bcom pa gang yin pa //

original: de ni bcom ldan 'di yin no //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'di yin no // zhes pa ste /
translated: He is the Blessed One who has destroyed evil.

original: 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
translated: This shows the perfection of abandonment.

original: de yang bag chags dang bag la nyal rtsa nas spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang bag chags dang bag la nyal rtsa nas spangs pa yin te /
translated: And that is the complete abandonment of the instincts and propensities.

original: 'di la nyon mongs pa zad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la nyon mongs pa zad pa med pa'o //

original: bla ma la sogs pa la brtan pas nyon mongs pa bstsal ba yin te /

analyzed: gang dag la yang thabs gang gis dus nyung zad la kun du spyod pa ma yin pa med de gtan du kun du spyod pa yang de rnams la yang dag par 'byung ba ni mar me lta bu ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir mar me ni dus ji ltar du rtsig pa dang snam bu dang lo ma la sogs pas de ltar bstsal na mi nus te /

original: de yang gtan du bral bar grub ste /
analyzed: de yang gtan du bral bar grub ste /

original: gzhan ngan song du skye ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni nges par mi 'byung ngo //üîΩde yang gnyen po dang bcas pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir sa bon bzhin te /

translated: And it is certain that other things, such as rebirth in the lower realms, do not occur.üîΩAnd that is like a seed together with its antidote,

analyzed: 'di ltar myu gu skye bar nus pa'i sa bon mi mthun pa'i phyogs mes tshig par gyur na thal bar 'gyur zhing nyams so //
translated: because when a seed is burned by fire, which is an opposing factor, it becomes ash and loses its ability to produce a sprout.

original: de bzhin du 'khor ba'i myu gu 'byung zhing skye bar nus pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dag bdag med pa ma mthong ba dang 'brel par gyur na rtsa ba dang bcas par 'gyur te /

translated: Likewise, the afflictions such as attachment, which are preceded by the view of the transitory collection, are able to produce and generate the sprout of cyclic existence. If they are related to those who have not seen selflessness, they are rooted.

original: de yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa //
translated: And it is said:

analyzed: phyin ci log gis 'khor ba ni rlung gis sprin gyi tshogs bzhin du //

original: de las log na de las grol //
analyzed: de las log na de las grol //
translated: If it is reversed, it is liberated from that.

analyzed: zhes so // so so'i skye bo'i sems dri ma dang bcas pa yang gser la sogs pa bzhin da dag bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: de bzhin du so so'i skye bo'i sems kyang rjes su mthun pa'i gnyen pos sems dri ma med pa ste /

analyzed: gal te de ni mi 'grub po zhe na ;

analyzed: tshad mas grub pa'i phyir rtsod pa med de gang gi phyir de la re zhig rang gi rgyud la ni mngon sum gyis grub pa yin te /

analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la yang rjes su dpag par grub pa yin no //

analyzed: de'i 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir me bzhin no //

analyzed: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid kyi me rab tu 'bar bas bdag nyid kyi dngos po gang 'di zhes bya ba bstan pa de rtogs par bya ba la kun du spyod pa 'dis nye bar gnod par shes pa la 'bad pa med pa nyid du 'grub pa'i phyir
